name: DIESELST\u00d6RMERS
blurb: High-octane carnage for 1-4 players featuring customizable motorguns, gas-guzzling knight armor, generated levels and randomized loot!

rewards.reward: CITIZEN\r\n==============================\r\nThank you, citizen! Any contribution to the cause is a worthy one. The propaganda network will keep you informed about our progress in this time of upheaval!

SCOUT\r\n==============================\r\nA digital copy of the finished game on Steam or potentially a DRM free version (release of DRM free depends on overall final game performance, see project description)

VANGUARD 
==============================
A digital copy of the finished game on Steam + EARLY ACCESS 
==============================
Join us in the trenches and get DieselStörmers for less than the Early Access start price

DRUMMER
==============================
All VANGUARD tier rewards + the digital soundtrack (MP3 and FLAC) + the digital artbook
==============================
Enter the thunderous beat of battle with full decorum!

STANDARD BEARER
==============================
All DRUMMER tier rewards + your name in the credits + a backer-exclusive battle standard for your Diesel Knight
==============================
This mighty symbol of your support will fly above your armor's engine, strong and true!

DOUBLE-BARRELED CHAMPIONS	
==============================
All STANDARD BEARER tier rewards + an additional digital copy of the game with an Early Access Steam key + a digital Diesel Knight model for 3D printing
==============================
Enlist a friend to the cause and print your very own Diesel Knights!

FULL-FORCE FIRETEAM ============================== All DOUBLE-BARRELED CHAMPIONS tier rewards + two additional digital copies of the game with an Early Access Steam key each ============================== Add two more friends to your team for a total of four furious enforcers!

DUKE OF DIESEL ============================== All DOUBLE-BARRELED CHAMPIONS tier rewards + a physical collector's edition of the PC game. The box will be delivered after the final game's release which is planned for Q2 2015.\r\n============================== Get the collector's box edition!

PATRON OF WARFARE
==============================
All DUKE OF DIESEL tier rewards + a physical copy of the artbook and soundtrack, a physical copy of the Making Of, a T-shirt and a can of Black Goop + a Black Forest Games bag to hold it all! The physical goods will be delivered after the final game's release which is planned for Q2 2015.
==============================
All the loot you can eat!

DIESEL LORD ============================== All PATRON OF WARFARE tier rewards + a DieselSt\u00f6rmers hoodie to keep you warm and cozy + a DieselSt\u00f6rmers canvas art print + you don't have to 3D-print your Diesel-Knight yourself - we will do it for you, put it on a pedestal and let the team sign it + special mention in the credits as a Diesel Lord + you can name a boss! Delivery of one physical part before x-mas, the other after final game release. ============================== Get it all and leave your mark on the city of Ravensdale!
